title: [CRITIC] Physics Agent Critical Bug - String Type Error
body:
## ðŸš¨ CRITIC AGENT - Critical Issue Detected

**Verdict:** REJECTED
**Confidence:** 90%
**Severity:** CRITICAL
**Category:** PHYSICS

### Issue Description
Physics agent fails with type error when processing kinematics calculations. The error `bad operand type for abs(): 'str'` indicates a type conversion issue in the physics calculations.

### Evidence
```
Task: {'type': 'mechanics', 'subtype': 'kinematics', 'initial_velocity': 10, 'acceleration': -9.8, 'time': 1.0}
Error: bad operand type for abs(): 'str'
Location: agents/physics_agent.py
```

### Impact
- Core physics calculations are broken
- Kinematics problems cannot be solved
- Agent learning system is compromised
- All physics-dependent workflows will fail

### Required Actions
- [ ] Fix type conversion in physics agent
- [ ] Add proper type validation
- [ ] Add unit tests for type safety
- [ ] Verify all physics calculations work
- [ ] Test with various input types

### Blocking Status
**BLOCKING** - Cannot merge until resolved

**Generated by:** Critic Agent v1.0

title: [CRITIC] Multiple Empty Test Methods Detected
body:
